name: Territorial Takeover
description:
Territorial Takeover is a fun, fast-paced mini-game where you're tasked with defending your own territory!

Controls

Each player gets assigned its' own controls by what it was joined with.

(e.g. if you press 'A' on one game-pad, that player will use that game-pad for controlling itself)

Sound

The most thrilling songs and sound shave been cherry-picked from the YouTube Audio library (https://www.youtube.com/audiolibrary/music) for the best player experience.

System Requirements

Storage: 512MB available

OS: Windows 7 32/64bit

Graphics: DirectX 9 or newer

Memory: 1GB RAM

Game-pads: Required for local multiplayer

Download

Download the game below. Extract all files and read the file "READ ME.txt". Follow further instructions.
